name: stripe-processor
description: A simple, but flexible web app to process a payment using the Stripe API.

STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Your public key for your Stripe account, e.g. pk_live_...

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Your secret key for your Stripe account, e.g. sk_live_...

STRIPE_TRANSACTION_RATE.description: The percentage rate for all Stripe transactions, e.g. 2.999

STRIPE_TRANSACTION_FLAT_FEE.description: The flat transaction fee for all Stripe transactions, e.g. 0.30
